subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Frederik Andersen made 29 saves, and the N.H.L.-leading Ducks scored two goals in the second period to beat the struggling Islanders at Nassau Coliseum on Saturday.
snippet: Frederik Andersen made 29 saves, and the N.H.L.-leading Ducks scored two goals in the second period to beat the struggling Islanders at Nassau Coliseum on Saturday.
